pinaka.title: PINAKA
pinaka.subtitle: Predictive Intelligence for Neural Activity and Kinetic Awareness

cards.label: Core Product
cards.title: Brainwave Prediction
cards.description: AI model for analyzing neural activity patterns from brain scan data with predictive capabilities.

cards.label: AI Research
cards.title: Memory Reconstruction
cards.description: Exploring AI techniques to simulate and analyze memory patterns from neural signals.

cards.label: Medical Research
cards.title: Cognitive Diagnostics
cards.description: Research in early detection methods for neurological conditions through brain activity analysis.

cards.label: Research
cards.title: Neurological Research Platform
cards.description: Developing tools for neuroscientists to study brainwave patterns and cognitive correlations.

cards.label: Neuroscience
cards.title: Decode Neural Intelligence
cards.description: Research focused on reconstructing intelligence patterns from neural signals using AI.

cards.label: AI Development
cards.title: Neuro-AI Systems
cards.description: Developing neural network architectures for brain-computer interface applications.

cards.label: Technology
cards.title: Breakthrough Research
cards.description: Creating proprietary algorithms for neural signal processing and analysis.

cards.label: Research
cards.title: Scientific Contribution
cards.description: Contributing to neuroscience and AI research with innovative approaches.

cards.title: AI Tools Development
cards.description: Creating AI-powered tools to assist with administrative and informational challenges.

cards.title: Medical Access Research
cards.description: Researching ways to make medical diagnostics more accessible through technology.

cards.title: Pattern Analytics
